sys_ui_message.key: A Flow consist of properties, a trigger, a sequence of actions, and the data collected or created. The trigger specifies the conditions that start the flow. When the trigger condition is true, the system starts the flow.
sys_ui_message.message: A Flow consist of properties, a trigger, a sequence of actions, and the data collected or created. The trigger specifies the conditions that start the flow. When the trigger condition is true, the system starts the flow.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: A Flow consist of properties, a trigger, a sequence of actions, and the data collected or created. The trigger specifies the conditions that start the flow. When the trigger condition is true, the system starts the flow.
